description: Approval to vary a condition to allow the premises to open from 10.00 hrs to 05.00 hours on Fridays and Saturdays and until 03.00 hours on Sundays preceding the Easter Monday bank holiday, the Early May bank holiday, the Spring bank holiday and the Summer bank holiday, relating to planning permission ref: P110382.
